title: Why does urgot get a buff right after he gets nerfed but other champs don’t?
body: I mean other champs that are basically urgot right now except for longer don’t get buffs

replies.body: maybe cause they don’t need buffs Duh
They are making Urgot less tanky but more viable in fights without his tankyness, not really nerf/buff, more reworking on how to play him
